timelines.desc: A few examples to give you ideas
timelines.name: Getting Started

updates.head: What is a 'Network'?
updates.text: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"A Breadcrumb Network is:","bold":true}]},{"type":"unordered-list","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"an organization, professional group, team, or community"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Use a network to organize groups of updates by topic and audience."}]}]

updates.head: What is a 'Timeline'?
updates.text: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"A Breadcrumb Timeline is:","bold":true}]},{"type":"unordered-list","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"a feed that tracks progress for a group"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Use a timeline to organize updates by an audience."}]}]

updates.head: What is an 'Update'?
updates.text: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"A Breadcrumb Update is:","bold":true}]},{"type":"unordered-list","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"a standard way to report the latest relevant information in a topic to a contact group."}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Use Updates to provide context on what has happened to other stakeholders."}]}]

updates.head: Daily Standup - Peter
updates.text: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"üöÄ "},{"text":" Yesterday‚Äôs achievements","bold":true}]},{"type":"unordered-list","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"[Issue #460] Switching between interfaces (settings) deletes update"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"[Issue $464] Posting updates doesn't reset editor"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"Setup local BE with Thomas's instruction (nearly done)"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"üó∫Ô∏è¬† "},{"text":"Today‚Äôs plan","bold":true}]},{"type":"unordered-list","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"[Issue #460] Switching between interfaces (share modal) deletes update"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"Try to follow the rest of local BE setup guide and get it running"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"üß±¬† "},{"text":"Blockers","bold":true}]},{"type":"unordered-list","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"According to Thomas, I need one more step to setup local BE as being added to flux repo and install apiserver via flux"}]}]}]

updates.head: Content now part of action bar
updates.text: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"üö®  "},{"text":"Breaking Design Changes","bold":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Select Component Changed","underline":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Dropdowns are being replaced with a new plasmic component called select (created by plasmic). Replacing components that consist of isOwner dropdowns rather than the old method of isDropDown variant.  I suspect this may break some things, hopefully we can figure out how to use this moving forward instead."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Components affected by new Select component:","underline":true}]},{"type":"unordered-list","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"MemberItem"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"VisibilityState"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"ActionBar"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"ContentPost"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"ReplyContent"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"üéØ  Next Steps","bold":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"@Peter: please review and we can sync for next steps"}]}]

timelines.desc: Keeping track of how we analyze data
timelines.name: Data Analysis Group

updates.head: Causal Inference is the future?
updates.text: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"üéØ  Topic: Causal Inference","bold":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Link https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/social-sciences/causal-inference"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"üìñ "},{"text":" Summary","bold":true}]},{"type":"unordered-list","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"Most data science is classification and regression"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"Correlation is not causation"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"But most data scientist takes a data scientist to interpret"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"Causal inference presents a way for normal folks to get better insights from data"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"‚ùì¬†"},{"text":"Question","bold":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Do you think casual inference is currently relevant for smbs?"}]}]

updates.head: Tracking Crypto - January 5th, 2022
updates.text: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"üìà¬† "},{"text":"Economy","bold":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"With the loosening up covid restrictions, many folks are bullish that 2022 will be an up year as supply chains catch up. However, rising interest rates, inflation, and political instability cause uncertainty."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"üíº   Portfolio","bold":true}]},{"type":"unordered-list","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"I‚Äôm bullish on recent allocations in $ETH and $BTC to materialize through the end of 2023"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"I'm doubling down on opportunistic investments in Defi layer 2 infrastructure"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"üöÄ  Recent Network Success:","bold":true}]},{"type":"unordered-list","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"text":"John and mike realized a 7X and 10x return from whitelist participation in RedactedDao and PixieDao"}]}]}]
